domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@Keir_Starmer You're well behind the game. The communication issue has been a point discussed all over the media this weekend, and I'm pretty sure the government have got the message

Your tweets are simply pushing at an open door. There's no risk for you.

That's not leadership.
#coronavirus
